title: www.Gambler.Casino
author: www.Gambler.Casino
content: Bounty programs have been around for a long time. Recently, earnings on Airdrops are gaining popularity, with the help of activity in blockchain wallets. It is necessary to do various activities, by transferring coins and buying and selling NFT.If you have experience - share statistics:How much can you earn on Bounty programs without investments?How much is earnings when you make activity in various wallets that the Airdrop requires?How often have you not received the promised funds?How much do you manage to earn for example in 1 year?Many will be very interested to know some statistics and how things are currently.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: There is I think bunch of people make a living just by doing bounties and airdrop me for example hahaha. Although the monthly earn is unstable sometimes you made a decent money sometimes don't because you know airdrop and bounties is seasonality program. I know a person that made more than 300K recently from ARBitrum Airdrop can you imagine that and if you live in country like Indonesia or Turkey or maybe other southeast Asia with 500-1000$ can do living with good meal and good living also there is dedicated thread that discussed about Is there a place in the world you could live like a king via sig campaigns? by The Sceptical Chymist you click here - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5390048.0
